role.argrole: entities arg0 compares again and again

example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (VP (VV 喜欢) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 比来比去)))) (PU ，) (VP (VP (VV 看到) (NP-OBJ (NN 别人)) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 买) (NP-OBJ (PN 什麽))))) (VP (ADVP (AD 也)) (VP (VV 会) (VP (VV 跟进)))))))
